thread.title: Do you wish your holiday pictures looked like this? Traveller photographs his model girlfriend as they visit stunning locations
thread.title_full: Do you wish your holiday pictures looked like this? Traveller photographs his model girlfriend as they visit stunning locations | Daily Mail Online

author: Becky Pemberton For Mailonline
title: Do you wish your holiday pictures looked like this? Traveller photographs his model girlfriend as they visit stunning locations
text:
5 shares 3
View
comments
If you are going to travel the world, you may as well take your soul mate with you for the ride.
And if you're both extremely good looking, handy with a camera and visiting stunning locations, then it's only right that you publish lots of pictures.
Michael Gallagher , 24, and his beautiful girlfriend Alexandra Carson , 27 - a former model - have done just that. Leaving behind day jobs in California the pair have set out to visit every country on earth - and documented their travels with stunning photos.
Stretched out in paradise: Traveller Alexandra Carson practises yoga whilst exploring the city walls of Dubrovnik in Croatia
Beach life: The couple's sunkissed life on the beach is enough to make anyone want to travel the world

Paradise: Alexandra explores a waterfall at the stunning Krka National Park in Croatia
Their travels have so far taken them from their US homes to Croatia, France and Greece among other places.
While many of the pictures include individual shots in mesmerising locations, there are plenty intimate shots of the couple having fun at festivals, on the beach and parasailing above a turquoise ocean.
 Next The female solo backpacker who braved civil war to capture... Are we there yet? 'Big Crazy Family Adventure' sees parents... From a crocodile loose in the cabin to lost flights in the... But just because they are on the road, it does not mean all glamour and romance is gone.
For Alexandra's birthday, Michael surprised her with a weekend in Positano on the Amalfi Coast where they completely put their budget to the side.
They stayed in an incredible suite with a sea view, dined at a Michelin Star restaurant, and lived a 'royal life' for a couple days.
It's hard to take a bad picture when Alexandra has previously worked as a model, and their backdrops include the whitewashed Santorini
Croatia's national parks are among the idyllic locations the couple spend their days at on the road
The couple recommend renting a row boat to explore the bright blue lake and smaller waterfalls at Krka National Park
Leaving behind their day jobs in California they have set out to visit every country on earth and document their travels with their stunning photos
But forget the money coming from parents or a Lottery win, the beautiful couple paid for their travels from their own savings.
'We saved for about six months, but all together we had less than $10k to start with, which is of course a very small amount of money for six people to travel Europe with,' Michael said.
'This is something we had both been dreaming about though, and we knew that taking a risk on something we were passionate about would pay off.'
The adventurous duo also run a travel blog, Couples Coordinates , updating followers of their escapes in paradise.
MICHAEL AND ALEXANDRA'S TIPS FOR TRAVELLING AS A COUPLE 1. Laugh. Always. Bad things are going to happen...we had our bikes stolen, I lost my wallet on a trip to London....s*** is going to happen and you just have to greet it with a smile.
2. Be vocal with one another. Make sure you know what each other want to do when you visit a city/location/go to an event etc.
3. Remain positive and always try to lift up the other person no matter what.
4. Also remember to spend some time apart. No matter how much you love someone, you're bound to want space at some point - especially when you're together 24/7.
Even if it is just a couple hours where I go to the gym and Alex does some yoga at home, it is super important to have that alone time.
Make local friends and spend time with them. Man time and woman time are imperative. You have to have some time to miss each other.
The adventurous duo run a travel blog, Couples Coordinates, updating followers of their escapes in paradise
Their travels include exploring places such as the Erecthion, Greece
Wish you were there? Michael poses in front of a spectacular waterfall in Plitvice Lakes National Park in Croatia
Looking down on the world: Alexandra witnesses the colourful Italian coastal town, Vernazza
Colourful world: Alexandra looks down on the breathtaking Plitvice Lakes National Park
Their travels have so far taken them from their US homes to Croatia, France and Greece among other places
The couple saved for six months before buying a one-way ticket to Europe to start their new life
And their enviable globetrotting adventures have earned them tens of thousands of followers on their social media pages.
Many of the shots feature Alexandra doing yoga poses in various locations, and she intends to spend November taking a yoga teacher certification course.
Their next adventures include going to Munich, Germany for Oktoberfest and Amsterdam and can be followed on their Facebook page .
Santorini looks stunning with its whitewashed houses and its turquoise ocean backdrop
Festival fun: The couple enjoyed the atmosphere at celebrity hotspot Coachella this year
Spectacular sunsets: Their enviable globetrotting adventures have earned them tens of thousands of followers on their social media pages
While many of the pictures include individual shots in mesmerising locations, there are plenty intimate shots of the couple having fun at festivals, on the beach and parasailing above a turquoise ocean
What's not to love? Alexandra makes a heart shape with her hands in a stunning sunset image by the sea
The couple took a wine tasting course in Provence which was fitting as Alex used to work in the wine industry back in Malibu a couple of years ago
The couple recommend the best activities and places to visit on their website
Winter is not coming: Alexandra witnesses Dubrovnik, famed for being the backdrop for several Game of Thrones scenes
Just because they are on the road does not mean all glamour and romance is gone, as the pair regularly take the time to surprise each other with dates
